name: Diving Truck Mountain Skill
description:
Diving Truck Mountain Skill is cargo truck transport simulator aimes at the successful transportation of the 3d cargo. You need to pick up the indian cargo using trailer and loads it into the indian truck driving simulator.
Features:
- 3d amazing game environment and real game play
- Real truck simulator witnessed ever
- Smooth steering control and hydraulic brakes in free cargo truck sim
- All-terrain vehicles like trailers, cranes etc
